vlive.korean: [이게 진짜일 리 없어...] 저 한 번만요! 저 한 번만요! [I can't believe it] Let me try once again! Please. 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.7
vlive.english: [I can't believe it] Let me try once again! Please.

vlive.korean: '뉴이스트 6년차일때 부터 팬이었는데 벌써 9년차 아이돌이라니 너무 시간이 빠르다' 와... "I was a fan since you were in your 6th year. I can't believe it's your 9th. Time goes so fast." 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU’EST REN] 안뇽🦋
vlive.english: "I was a fan since you were in your 6th year. I can't believe it's your 9th. Time goes so fast."

vlive.korean: 너만 믿는다! I believe in you. 듣기 View video OSEN : Stray Kids 스트레이키즈, 게임에 정신없이 빠져버린 썰 #스타로드 12
그걸 나보고 믿으라고? Do you want me to believe it? 듣기 View video 컨스TV : 니들 나한테 용사따윈 바라지 마라![넘버식스]ep8.
vlive.english: Do you want me to believe it?

vlive.korean: 이제 나 좀 믿어주면 안 될까? Will you believe me, please? 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 존잘 연하가 선배 꼬시는 법 [엑스엑스(XX)] - EP.05

examples.korean: Believe. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 믿으세요. TIMES CORE
